testcase.name: Fact Variable Reference not Allowed
testcase.description: If a filter that is associated with fact variables by a variable-set-filter relationship implies an XPath expression that includes an XPath variable reference to a general variable or a fact variable. then the error MUST be thrown

variation.name: Variable-set filter refers to a fact variable
variation.description: A filter associated with fact variables by a variable-set-filter implies an XPath expression that includes an XPath variable reference to a fact variable.

variation.name: Variable-set filter refers to a genral variable
variation.description: A filter associated with fact variables by a variable-set-filter implies an XPath expression that includes an XPath variable reference to a general variable.
